entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 07:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 2.3°C
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: E 77 km/h gust 97 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers this morning. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind east 90 km/h gusting to 120 except gusting to 160 in the Wreckhouse area this morning. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 late this morning then west 20 gusting to 40. High 7. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
